blogContent: This is my first blog post. Welcome to our mental health blog. Here you will find helpful material on how to stay healthy and happy.

blogTopic: Helpful Resource During this Stay-at-home Period
blogContent:
Online counseling can be a great resource to help your mental state during this uncertain time. They can provide help with anxiety, depression, and other issues. Besides scheduling with a KSU counselor you can use resources like BetterHelp. 

https://www.betterhelp.com/


Stay Healthy and Well!


George

Besides doing things to help our mind (counseling and meditation) we can also do physical things like Yoga. Yoga journal has some great resources please see the link below: 


https://www.yogajournal.com/



Be healthy and well. 



George
